description: FINRA Rule 4560 requires FINRA member firms to report their short positions in all over-the-counter ("OTC") equity securities to FINRA. The Consolidated Short Interest data provides a single view of OTC short interest positions submissions across all exchanges. OTC equity short interest is available for view by issue, or by downloadable pipe-delimited text file containing all OTC equity securities reported with a short position. Data is available online for one rolling year based on the settlement date provided in the Short Interest Reporting Deadlines.

fields.name: accountingYearMonthNumber
fields.description: Settlement Date for Shorts Cycle in YYYYMMDD format

fields.name: issuerServicesGroupExchangeCode
fields.description: The issuer's service group exchange code.

fields.name: currentShortPositionQuantity
fields.description: Short Position in the current cycle

fields.name: previousShortPositionQuantity
fields.description: Short Position in the previous cycle

fields.name: stockSplitFlag
fields.description: Flag indicating a stock split has taken place. It will either be a 'S', if there was a split in the current shorts cycle, or a null.

fields.name: averageDailyVolumeQuantity
fields.description: Average Daily Volume Quantity. Default value is 0. Excludes non-media trades

fields.name: daysToCoverQuantity
fields.description: Days to Cover Quantity. Default value is 0

fields.name: revisionFlag
fields.description: Will either be 'R', if the short position for the prior cycle was revised, or null

fields.name: changePercent
fields.description: Percent Change in Short Position between Previous Unadjusted and current Short Position, rounded to 2 decimal places. If there is no previous short position or if it is 0, then this value will be 100

fields.name: changePreviousNumber
fields.description: Difference between Current Short Position and Previous Unadjusted Short Position
